Class DurationUtils

extends Object
    Utility class for Akka related functions.

    • Method Detail

      • durationFromNowUntil

        @Nonnull
public static scala.concurrent.duration.FiniteDuration durationFromNowUntil(@Nullable
                                                                                     org.joda.time.DateTime endTime)
        Returns the time that is left between "now" and given time instance as an Akka duration instance.
        Parameters:
        endTime - Target time. Normally after "now" (or result will be 0). Null means "now".
        Returns:
        Duration indication of time left until "now". Always >= 0.

      • duration

        @Nonnull
public static scala.concurrent.duration.FiniteDuration duration(@Nonnull
                                                                         org.joda.time.Duration duration)
        Converts a joda duration to an Akka duration.
        Parameters:
        duration - Joda duration.
        Returns:
        Akka duration.

      • duration

        @Nonnull
public static scala.concurrent.duration.FiniteDuration duration(@Nullable
                                                                         org.joda.time.DateTime startTime,
                                                                         @Nullable
                                                                         org.joda.time.DateTime endTime)
        Converts the difference between two joda times to an Akka duration.
        Parameters:
        startTime - Start time. Null means "now".
        endTime - End time. Null means "now".
        Returns:
        Akka duration. Always >= 0.

      • max

        @Nullable
public static scala.concurrent.duration.Deadline max(@Nullable
                                                               scala.concurrent.duration.Deadline d1,
                                                               @Nullable
                                                               scala.concurrent.duration.Deadline d2)
        Returns the deadline to expire last.
        Parameters:
        d1 - first deadline
        d2 - second deadline
        Returns:
        d1 if d1.timeLeft() >= d2.timeLeft() else d2. If either is null, the other is returned.
